data.name: Ludicolo

abilities.name: Table Service
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Punch and Run
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.

abilities.name: Overzealous
abilities.text: If your opponent has any Pokémon-ex in play, each of Ludicolo's attacks does 30 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

abilities.name: Swing Dance
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Healing Steps
attacks.text: You may discard as many cards as you like from your hand. If you do, remove that many damage counters from Ludicolo.

attacks.name: Circular Steps
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's), excluding Ludicolo.

data.name: Ludicolo

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.text: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Ludicolo.

attacks.name: Nature Power
attacks.text: If you have a Stadium Card in play, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage. If your opponent has a Stadium card in play, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

data.flavorText: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.

data.name: Ludicolo

abilities.name: Captivating Rhythm
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Solar Ray
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

data.flavorText: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.text: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Ludicolo.

attacks.name: Hydro Punch
attacks.text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Ludicolo but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

data.name: Ludicolo

attacks.name: Spirited Rushdown
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage for each Prize card you have taken.

data.flavorText: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.

abilities.name: Happy Dance
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Happy Dance Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Water Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to Ludicolo. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.text: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Ludicolo.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Ludicolo

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.text: At any times between turns, heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Groovy Dance
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

data.flavorText: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.

abilities.name: Cheerful Voice
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. If you do, your turn ends. During your next turn, each of Ludicolo's attacks does 60 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Mad Dance
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Best Dance
attacks.text: After doing damage, remove from Ludicolo the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon. Ludicolo can't use Best Dance during your next turn.

data.name: Ludicolo

ancientTrait.name: α Recovery
ancientTrait.text: When this Pokémon is healed, double the amount healed.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Splash Dance
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Splash Dance attack does 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.

data.name: Ludicolo

abilities.name: Swing Dance
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card.

attacks.name: Circular Steps
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each other Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's).

data.flavorText: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.

data.name: Ludicolo

abilities.name: Enthusiastic Dance
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may use this Ability. During this turn, your Basic Pokémon's attacks do 100 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: If it hears festive music, it begins moving in rhythm in order to amplify its power.

data.name: Ludicolo

abilities.name: Vibrant Dance
abilities.text: All of your Pokémon in play get +40 HP. The effect of Vibrant Dance doesn't stack.

data.flavorText: There are structures throughout its whole body that produce energy when hit by sound waves with a cheerful rhythm.

data.name: Ludicolo

abilities.name: Excited Heal
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if you have any Grass Mega Evolution Pokémon ex in play, you may use this Ability. Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

data.flavorText: There are structures throughout its whole body that produce energy when hit by sound waves with a cheerful rhythm.

data.name: Ludicolo

abilities.name: Excited Heal
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if you have any Grass Mega Evolution Pokémon ex in play, you may use this Ability. Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

data.flavorText: There are structures throughout its whole body that produce energy when hit by sound waves with a cheerful rhythm.
